entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
